metadata.title: 5197-1 -- Apache Log4j 2 vulnerability
metadata.description: It was found that the fix to address CVE-2021-44228 in Apache Log4j 2.15.0 was incomplete in certain non-default configurations. An attacker could use this vulnerability to cause a denial of service. Please see the following link for more information: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SecurityTeam/KnowledgeBase/Log4Shell
